data.actual_result: The server list jumps up and down violently
data.expected_result: Server should move up smoothly, as with downwards scrolling
data.short_description: Moving servers upwards in the server sorter causes the list to violently shake
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the server sorter by holding on a servers icon in the server list - Ensure you are in enough servers so that at least another screens worth of servers is above your view - Scroll to the bottom of the list, or anywhere in the list where there a considerable amount of servers above your view - Move the server closest to the top of your screen upwards, make sure that you hold the server above the title bar
